question:
In context with the defence ministry approving projects under the Make-II category, consider the following statements:
  1. Make-II projects involve private sector players.
  2. It allows suo motu project proposals.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Make-II of the Make in India initiative involves the participation of private sector players and MSMEs in the defence category. It is involved in prototype development. It is aimed at achieving import substitution and better engagement of the private sector. Statement 2 is correct: Make-II was revised and simplified in 2018. It allows the suo motu proposal of projects from private industrial players. This is especially encouraged when the project involves a proposal to develop components that is currently sourced through imports. Anti-Tank Guided Missiles and Auxiliary Power Units are being developed under this initiative.
